name: Rock Punisher vs The Dungeon Keeper
name_original: Rock Punisher vs The Dungeon Keeper
description:
Adventure crossover game from my games "Rock Punisher" and "The Dungeon Keeper".

Leona and Claire enter a dungeon to take the treasures. However, they are unaware of the Keeper and that he doesn´t tolerate thieves. Claire wants to get out but Leona still wants to steal the treasures. In order to take the treasures and escape savely, you must avoid the keeper and only fight him when you get the chance.  The Keeper eats everyone who enters his dungeon.

Controls:

-Movement: arrow keys

-Confirm: "z" key

-Cancel / pause / back: "x" key

---------------------------------------

Credits:

-Music: Grumble labs, JDB artist

-Plugins: Yanfly

-Japanese voices: Cross Phase Inc.
